titleStmt.title: The art of love in two books. Written both to men and ladies. A new poem.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Charles, 1664?-1700?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Joseph Wild, at the Elephant at Charing-Cross,
publicationStmt.date: 1700. Where gentlemen and ladies may pick novels at 6 s. per doz. and be furnish'd with most sorts of plays.

notesStmt.note: "The art of love: the second book. Written to the ladies. A new poem" has separate dated title page, pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
